item.description: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?

item.title: Al-Quran-104:6
item.description: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,

item.title: Al-Quran-104:7
item.description: Which mounts directed at the hearts.

item.title: Al-Quran-104:8
item.description: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them

item.title: Al-Quran-104:9
item.description: In extended columns.

item.title: Al-Quran-105:1
item.description: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?

item.title: Al-Quran-105:2
item.description: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?

item.title: Al-Quran-105:3
item.description: And He sent against them birds in flocks,

item.title: Al-Quran-105:4
item.description: Striking them with stones of hard clay,

item.title: Al-Quran-105:5
item.description: And He made them like eaten straw.

item.title: Al-Quran-106:1
item.description: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -

item.title: Al-Quran-106:2
item.description: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -

item.title: Al-Quran-106:3
item.description: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

item.title: Al-Quran-106:4
item.description: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.

item.title: Al-Quran-107:1
item.description: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?

item.title: Al-Quran-107:2
item.description: For that is the one who drives away the orphan

item.title: Al-Quran-107:3
item.description: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

item.title: Al-Quran-107:4
item.description: So woe to those who pray

item.title: Al-Quran-107:5
item.description: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -

item.title: Al-Quran-107:6
item.description: Those who make show [of their deeds]

item.title: Al-Quran-107:7
item.description: And withhold [simple] assistance.

item.title: Al-Quran-108:1
item.description: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

item.title: Al-Quran-108:2
item.description: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].

item.title: Al-Quran-108:3
item.description: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.

item.title: Al-Quran-109:1
item.description: I do not worship what you worship.

item.title: Al-Quran-109:2
item.description: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

item.title: Al-Quran-109:3
item.description: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.

item.title: Al-Quran-109:4
item.description: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.

item.title: Al-Quran-110:1
item.description: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

item.title: Al-Quran-110:2
item.description: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

item.title: Al-Quran-110:3
item.description: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

item.title: Al-Quran-111:1
item.description: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

item.title: Al-Quran-111:2
item.description: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.

item.title: Al-Quran-111:3
item.description: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame

item.title: Al-Quran-111:4
item.description: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.

item.title: Al-Quran-111:5
item.description: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.

item.title: Al-Quran-112:1
item.description: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

item.title: Al-Quran-112:2
item.description: He neither begets nor is born,

item.title: Al-Quran-113:1
item.description: From the evil of that which He created

item.title: Al-Quran-113:2
item.description: And from the evil of darkness when it settles

item.title: Al-Quran-113:3
item.description: And from the evil of the blowers in knots

item.title: Al-Quran-114:1
item.description: The Sovereign of mankind.

item.title: Al-Quran-114:2
item.description: The God of mankind,

item.title: Al-Quran-114:3
item.description: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -

item.title: Al-Quran-114:4
item.description: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -
